function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Healthcare workers not using personal protective equipment (PPE)","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of the pathogen, leading to the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict contact and airborne precautions, provision of adequate PPE, and regular training on PPE use","Technologies":"N95 or FFP3 masks, eye protection gear, gowns, gloves, and other PPE","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general public","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health departments"},{"Description":"Lack of coronavirus vaccine","Impact":"Continued spread and impact of the coronavirus pandemic","Mitigation":"Accelerate vaccine development, conduct rigorous testing, and distribute the vaccine widely","Technologies":"Vaccine development technologies, clinical trial technologies, distribution and logistics technologies","People":"Global population","Owner":"Scientific research institutions, pharmaceutical companies, governments, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate use of Information Technology in solving and reducing organizational or business problems","Impact":"Inefficient problem-solving and potential disruptions in business operations","Mitigation":"Invest in IT infrastructure and systems, provide training to IT staff, and implement best practices in IT management","Technologies":"IT infrastructure, problem-solving software, training and development platforms","People":"IT staff, business personnel, organizational leadership","Owner":"Businesses, IT departments, organizational leadership"}]}
